name: Beyond Earth Demo
description:
Beyond Earth is a retro shooter game that uses new age game features with arcade based game logic. You play as a character named Zim, a falsely accused but most wanted criminal in the galactic. Overcome hordes, destroy bosses, and level up in this fast paced space shooter.

Controls:

Move: left - A, right - D (or arrow keys)

Shoot: Space Bar

Shield: Press E: last 3 seconds with a cooldown of 15 seconds, absorbs 1 small attack

Feedback:

Feel free to provide feedback relating to bugs or suggestions in the comments. This game is not anywhere near complete but I would like to build it based off feedback from players.
